DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate ability encapsulation orally applied lipid yoghurt snack modify ad libitum food intake satiety , without GI symptom . Every subject receive two treatment ( active , placebo ) two different day , follow randomize cross-over design .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2530 kg/m2 Voluntary participation Milk ( protein lactose ) allergy/intolerance History serious GI complaints/surgeries Pregnancy , lactation Excessive alcohol consumption ( > 20 per week ) Abnormal eat behaviour Intention stop smoking Reported unexplained weight loss gain month prior screen Selfadmitted HIVpositive state
